name: Quantum Bummer Blues
description:
Escape from space prison, smash atoms, chase high scores, and paint pretty pictures with the river of your blood.

Keyboard controls:

W - up

A - left

D - right

down arrow - bloodshot/confirm

enter - pause/confirm

F1 - scale game window down

F2 - scale game window up

Gamepad controls (Xinput only):

dpad up - up

dpad left - left

dpad right - right

A - bloodshot/confirm

start - pause/confirm

IMPORTANT NOTE: If you're having issues where the game will not register your keyboard inputs, unplugging any controllers should resolve the problem.
